name: Lambda Solutions
tag_list: e-learning, training, emploee-training, online-course, rapid-learning, education, social-learning, community-of-learning, learning-on-demand, authoring, online-campus
overview:
Lambda Solutions provides a wide range of e-Learning services, including online course creation and a full range of services for the Moodle (LMS) Learning Management System. Through superior Instructional Design methodology, we have created the Rapid Course Development (RCD) model providing our clients with a cost effective solution for custom course creation.

Lambdaâ€™s Moodle LMS expertise spans all facets of service including customization, hosting and support for this unique open - source application. Our goal is to provide cost effective quality e-Learning solutions that are easily deployed in companies and organizations, large and small.

Lambda Solutions clients are global corporations, government organizations and educational institutions throughout North America and the world. These include PMC-Sierra, Kumon, Rogers, Simon Fraser University, Kwantlen University College and the governments of British Columbia and Alberta. Last year, over 200,000 individuals completed courses provided by Lambda Solutions.
